<< leapyear time functions sleep >>

now

Returns current date under the form of a Unix hour.

Syntax

n = now()

Output argument

n

a double.

Description

now() returns the current date and time as a serial date number.

Example

datevec(now())

See also

datenum, datevec.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
